page.title: 03HOME LIFE (2)
page.content: Children of school age- over 5 - travel by school bus or private car either to Finchingfield, Steeple Bumpstead or Braintree.Under 5's go to Toddler Group also Playgroup in Finchingfield. There is no resident doctor or policeman however a doctors surgery is held in the village hall each Wednesday for those unable to reach the surgery in Gt.Bardfield or Thaxted.The nearest Hospital is at Broomfield - 27 miles away. Dental treatment is sought in Braintree, Haverhill and Thaxted. As there is no shop in the village,travel into the towns or Finchingfield is necessary to get provisions.Many traders provide a doorstep delivery,the milkman,postman and paperman come daily,the baker 3 times a week and others including the butcher,greengrocer and grocer weekly. The dustmen collects refuse each week.
